text: Tommy Harrison (born 22 January 1974) is a Scottish footballer, who played for Heart of Midlothian, Dunfermline Athletic, Clyde, York City, Carlisle United, Berwick Rangers, East Fife and Montrose. ==References== ==External links== * * Category:1974 births Category:Living people Category:Association football midfielders Category:Scottish footballers Category:Heart of Midlothian F.C. players Category:Dunfermline Athletic F.C. players Category:Clyde F.C. players Category:York City F.C. players Category:Carlisle United F.C. players Category:Berwick Rangers F.C. players Category:East Fife F.C. players Category:Montrose F.C. players Category:Scottish Football League players Category:English Football League players Category:Footballers from Edinburgh Category:Scotland youth international footballers
title: Tommy Harrison (footballer)
